qualitynurse.title: Quality Nurse Web Platform
qualitynurse.description: Solo developer modernizing a rustic PHP-based website into a comprehensive React.js platform. Transformed outdated system into modern, responsive web application featuring 11 medical services with 24/7 availability, appointment scheduling, and patient management systems.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Discover my recent work showcasing my skills in web and mobile development.

qualitynurse.title: Quality Nurse Website
qualitynurse.description: Comprehensive healthcare management platform modernizing nursing care quality systems. Features 11 integrated medical services, 24/7 availability, appointment scheduling, patient management, and real-time monitoring dashboard.
qualitynurse.longDescription: Quality Nurse represents a comprehensive digital transformation of healthcare management systems. This project involved completely modernizing a legacy PHP-based website into a sophisticated React.js platform. The system now seamlessly integrates 11 distinct medical services, providing round-the-clock availability and advanced patient management capabilities. Through careful planning and execution, we transformed an outdated system into a modern, scalable platform that serves both healthcare providers and patients effectively.

lasermagique.title: Laser Magique Application
lasermagique.description: Complete digital transformation of entertainment center operations from paper-based to mobile-first management. Comprehensive booking system, inventory tracking, real-time statistics, and payment history for laser tag and entertainment services.
lasermagique.longDescription: Laser Magique represents a complete digital revolution for entertainment center operations. This comprehensive Flutter application transforms traditional paper-based management into a streamlined, mobile-first solution. The system handles everything from complex booking algorithms to real-time inventory management, payment history, and customer statistics. Currently in active development, this project showcases the power of modern mobile technology in revolutionizing traditional business operations.
nextSteps: Create detailed interface for client profile cards
